entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:56 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 7:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
